reviewText: Shows the story from beginning to end of the best striker of all time "Ronaldo or R9". Interesting and amazing story. For many who idolize this man as much  as I do definitely recommend!
Ronaldo El Fenomeno in his prime is amazing to see. you could learn so me good moves from this DVD.

This DVD is excellent, it shows his amazing highlights from when he was playing for PSV, Barcelona and Inter. This is what people need to see. They try to tell you that Zidane is the best player of this new age, without even taking a look at what Ronaldo did. After you watch this, it'll be enough to convince you that he is the best of this generation. It's after him that Ronaldinho and these new players look after. Not discrediting Zidane one bit, but Ronaldo is the man. So buy it and enjoy legendary stuff from this superb player!
